content.question: Which of the following will happen if the actual inflation rate is greater than the expected inflation rate?

choices.label: Lenders of fixed interest rate loans will be better off.
Lenders of variable interest rate loans will be worse off.
Borrowers of fixed interest rate loans will be worse off.
Borrowers of fixed interest rate loans will be better off.
Borrowers of variable interest rate loans will be better off.

content.answer: Borrowers of fixed interest rate loans will be better off.
